definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: spread out (NH id.; Aram. mtah., [[מְתַח]]; Ar. matah.a be long, mat=a0h. long (prob. load-word); cf. perhaps As. matâḫu, direct  the eyes toward);—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[וַיִּמְתָּחֵם]] Is 40:22 and he (´[[י]]) hath spread them (the heavens) out as a tent to dwell in.
